thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Business-intelligence of Oriental Nations to set up IT unit with registered capital of 30 mln yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Business-intelligence of Oriental Nations to set up IT unit with registered capital of 30 mln yuan

organizations.name: reuters) - business-intelligence of oriental nations corp ltd

text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Business-intelligence of Oriental Nations Corp Ltd
* Says it will set up a Guangdong-based wholly owned IT unit with registered capital of 30 million yuan
* The unit will be engaged in development of industrial internet public service platforms
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/eSgSSL
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
